comments: To stand in front of a class and give a speech is not easy. Dr. Mick makes EVERYONE comfortable and is so encouraging especially to those who have more difficulty doing so. He\'s a forgotten hippie from the day and a bit scattered, but that makes him more endearing. I loved taking this class from him!

Dr. Mick is awesome!!! His class was fun and as long as you come to class and do the speeches to the outline he gives then you should have no problem getting an A. He\'s so nice and helpful and wants everyone to succeed. You would have to be a huge slacker not to do well in his class.
He is a very easy going teacher. If you do the work you will get the grade for it.
Excellent. very helpful prof. fun class attendance is a must..will take classes with him anytime
Great teacher. Very funny. Works with you on your grade. Easy class the only thing is the attendance. After 2 your grade drops 1 letter. other wise pretty cool dude.

I took Speech class with Dr. Barry and it was fantastic! He\'s also a reverend but he\'s probably the happiest guy you\'ll ever meet. His classes are fun and engaging, and he really has a way of drawing the class together while at the same time teaching the material. A+
